title: New Blitzcrank Skin (& Bundle)
body: This is more or a personal Query of mine. I remember the Lancer and Rogue (not sure if that's the right name or not) Blitzcrank skins were temporarily released shortly before the Project event as a Bundle, but were quickly removed because of a bug with refunds (if I'm remembering the message correctly). My question to anyone with knowledge is, When can we expect the skins (and more importantly the bundle) to return to the store again?

replies.body:
Finally got some info ^_^!

Looks like the devs seem to have gotten to the bottom of that weird refund issue, so the Lancer Paragon and Lancer Rogue Blitz Skins [**should be returning to the store around patch 7.24**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/UJ0J2hs2-lancer-paragon-and-lancer-rogue-blitz-store-issue) at the earliest.

**When **can we expect the skins (and more importantly the bundle) to return to the store again?

(note the When as part of the sentence)
The info in the post I linked is the info we have at this time, hence my linking it for reference when it gets updated ^_^
Appreciate the Help and Info friend.
